attributes.action: Protect children from paedophiles and ensure harsher, longer sentences are imposed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children need to be protected from paedophiles. Anyone found guilty of any sex crime against children should be locked up and not let out. There is no cure for these sick perverts and our children need to be safe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
